KnowledgeBase.Title: vectorTanhInnerProduct

KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords:
tan tangent hyperbolic product math
support vector functions kernel

Function.Description: The vectorTanhInnerProduct function returns the hyperbolic tangent inner product of the two Number Vector arguments x1 and x2.

Brief.Overview:
The vectorTanhInnerProduct function returns the hyperbolic tangent inner product of the two Number Vector arguments x1 and x2. The C formula used is as follows:

(tanh (vectorInnerProduct x1 x2))

The output of this function is periodic in the closed range of [-pi,+pi].
Brief.Usage: The vectorTanhInnerProduct function may be used as a kernel for support vector machine regression (see the svmRegression function).

Argument.Name: x1
Argument.Note: The first Number Vector to be multiplied

Argument.Name: x2
Argument.Note: The second Number Vector to be multiplied

Syntax.Return: The hyperbolic tangent inner or dot product of the two vectors.
